name: Bamboo River Rafting
description: Climb aboard a 30-foot, bamboo raft for an authentic Jamaican experience. Your experienced captain will skillfully pole the raft and navigate the jade-green waters of the Martha Brae River located in the parish of Trelawny (birthplace of sprinter Usain Bolt). Trail your hand in the shimmering waters and gaze into the trees filled with colorful birds and exotic flowers. Surrender to the romance of the moment, experiencing a truly Jamaican pastime as you float under the glistening in the sun.
